attributes.action: The Tax payer should not pay a penny towards Princess Eugenie's wedding.
attributes.additional_details: Princess Eugenie is reportedly worth £3.6 million. Princess Eugenie carries out no royal functions and is of no use to the public.
attributes.background:
Prince Andrew – who is fabulously wealthy with an estimated worth of £65m – should foot the bill himself.”

The NHS should benefit from this £2 million.
